items.name: GridAlignment
items.summary: Snaps an object's position, rotation, and scale to grid increments.

items.name: unitSize
items.summary: The base unit scale of the grid.

items.name: positionIncrement
items.summary: The amount of units the position is rounded to on the grid.

items.name: scaleIncrement
items.summary: The amount of units the scale is rounded to on the grid.

items.name: rotationIncrement
items.summary: The amount of units the rotation is rounded to on the grid.

items.name: AlignToGrid()
items.summary: Updates the transform of the object to align to the grid.

items.name: Snap(Vector3, Single)
items.summary: Snaps a vector to the grid at a given increment.

syntax.content: public Vector3 Snap(Vector3 vector, float increment)

parameters.description: The amount of units the vector is rounded to.

return.description: The vector snapped to the grid.

items.name: MaterialPattern.Preset
items.summary: An enumerated preset of material patterns.

items.name: MaterialPattern
items.summary: A material pattern, defined by a texture asset.

items.name: preset
items.summary: The preset enumeration value of the pattern.

items.name: emissionMap
items.summary: The emission map texture of the pattern.

items.name: normalMap
items.summary: The normal map texture of the pattern.

items.name: heightMap
items.summary: The height map texture of the pattern.

items.name: MaterialPattern(MaterialPattern.Preset, Texture2D, Texture2D, Texture2D)
items.summary: Creates a new material pattern with the specified preset.

syntax.content: public MaterialPattern(MaterialPattern.Preset preset, Texture2D emissionMap = null, Texture2D normalMap = null, Texture2D heightMap = null)

parameters.description: The preset enumeration value of the pattern.
The emission map texture of the pattern.
The normal map texture of the pattern.
The height map texture of the pattern.

items.name: MaterialPatternPalette
items.summary: A collection of material pattern presets.

items.name: patterns
items.summary: The available patterns in the palette.

items.name: GetPattern(MaterialPattern.Preset)
items.summary: Gets the material pattern for the given preset.

parameters.description: The preset to get the material pattern for.

return.description: The material pattern for the given preset.

items.name: MaterialSelector
items.summary: Assigns a renderer's material from a preset list of options.

items.name: Apply(MaterialStyle, MaterialPattern)
items.summary: Applies the selected style and pattern to the renderer.

syntax.content: public override void Apply(MaterialStyle style, MaterialPattern pattern)

items.name: MaterialSelectorBase
items.summary: Assigns a renderer's material from a preset list of options.

items.name: style
items.summary: The selected style preset.

items.name: styles
items.summary: The palette of available styles.

items.name: pattern
items.summary: The selected pattern preset.

items.name: patterns
items.summary: The palette of available patterns.

items.name: Apply(MaterialStyle, MaterialPattern)
items.summary: Applies the selected style and pattern to the renderer.

syntax.content: public abstract void Apply(MaterialStyle style, MaterialPattern pattern)

items.name: Apply(MaterialStyle.Preset, MaterialPattern.Preset)
items.summary: Applies the preset style and pattern to the object.

syntax.content: public void Apply(MaterialStyle.Preset stylePreset, MaterialPattern.Preset patternPreset)

items.name: Apply()
items.summary: Applies the current style and pattern to the object.

items.name: MaterialSelectorGroup
items.summary: Assigns a group of renderers' materials from a preset list of options.

items.name: Apply(MaterialStyle, MaterialPattern)
items.summary: Applies the selected style and pattern to the renderer.

syntax.content: public override void Apply(MaterialStyle style, MaterialPattern pattern)

items.name: MaterialSelectorRenderer
items.summary: Applies a material style and pattern to a renderer.

items.name: renderer
items.summary: The renderer that holds the material being selected (Read only).

items.name: Apply(MaterialStyle, MaterialPattern)
items.summary: Applies the selected style and pattern to the renderer.

syntax.content: public void Apply(MaterialStyle style, MaterialPattern pattern)

items.name: CreateMaterial(MaterialStyle, MaterialPattern)
items.summary: Creates a material from the selected style and pattern.

syntax.content: public Material CreateMaterial(MaterialStyle style, MaterialPattern pattern)

items.name: MaterialStyle.Preset
items.summary: An enumerated preset of material styles.

items.name: MaterialStyle
items.summary: A material style, defined by color, metallic, and smoothness values.

items.name: preset
items.summary: The preset enumeration value of the style.

items.name: color
items.summary: The color of the material style.

items.name: metallic
items.summary: The metallic value of the material style.

items.name: smoothness
items.summary: The smoothness value of the material style.

items.name: MaterialStyle(MaterialStyle.Preset, Color, Single, Single)
items.summary: Creates a new material style with the specified preset.

syntax.content: public MaterialStyle(MaterialStyle.Preset preset, Color color = null, float metallic = 0F, float smoothness = 0F)

parameters.description: The preset enumeration value of the style.
The color of the material style.
The metallic value of the material style.
The smoothness value of the material style.

items.name: MaterialStylePalette
items.summary: A collection of material style presets.

items.name: styles
items.summary: The available styles in the palette.

items.name: GetStyle(MaterialStyle.Preset)
items.summary: Gets the material style for the given preset.

parameters.description: The preset to get the material style for.

return.description: The material style for the given preset.

items.name: MaterialTiling
items.summary: Automatically tiles the materials of an object based on its scale.

items.name: renderer
items.summary: The renderer component of the material being tiled (Read only).

items.name: scaleMultiplier
items.summary: The texture scale multiplier of the material being tiled.

items.name: autoUpdate
items.summary:
Whether the material texture(s) are tiled automatically when the
transform changes.

items.name: Tile()
items.summary: Tiles the materials of the object.

items.name: SetTextureScale(Material, Vector2)
items.summary: Sets the texture scale of a material.

syntax.content: protected void SetTextureScale(Material material, Vector2 scale)

parameters.description: The material to set the texture scale of.

items.summary: Updates the materials of the object.

items.summary: Updates the materials of the object while running in the editor.
